description: I'm a test automation engineer with a development background and a knack for technical writing. I'm also a Udemy instructor.
skills: Programming in Java, C#, C++, and JS
detailOrQuote: I'm passionate about software development and teaching the world about it. My courses about TCP/IP socket programming and UI test automation with WinAppDriver have been great successes. My blog entries have been widely enjoyed by my fellow IT professionals as well.
